Title: Relates to establishing a program to incentivize unemployed individuals to enter jobs in healthcare
Summary: Directs the commissioner of education, in conjunction with the commissioner of health and the commissioner of labor, to develop a program which incentivizes unemployed individuals to enter jobs in healthcare, including but not limited to, certified nurse aides.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing a program to incentivize unemployed individuals to enter jobs in healthcare
